author: vmassol
msg: Complete rewrite of the plugin. Now using AspectJ 1.1 and performing binary weaving on jar generated by the jar:jar goal. Also supports creation and weaving-in of reusable aspect libraries.

author: vmassol
msg: The plugin actually uses StatCvs-XML, not StatCvs.

author: vmassol
msg: Releasing version 2.0 of the statcvs plugin. This is the release for Maven 1.0rc1.
